comments.body: maybe add the concat example too?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +135,139 @@        c2 = Categorical(['a', 'b', 'c'], categories=['b', 'a', 'c'])
        result = union_categoricals([c1, c2])
        expected = Categorical(['a', 'b', 'c', 'a', 'b', 'c'],
                               categories=['a', 'b', 'c'])
        tm.assert_categorical_equal(result, expected)
